scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('fs').stat('lib', function (e, s) { process.exit(e || !s.isDirectory() ? 1 : 0) })" || npm run build

1.14.0.name: history
1.14.0.description: A minimal, functional history implementation for JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es6
scripts.build-cjs: rimraf lib && babel ./modules --stage 0 --loose all --plugins dev-expression -d lib --ignore '__tests__'
scripts.build-es6: rimraf es6 && babel ./modules --stage 0 --loose all --plugins dev-expression -d es6 --blacklist=es6.modules --ignore '__tests__'
